summary:
Over 30 new blacksmithing recipies!
Craftable Arrows!
Brand new arrow types!
Craftable Lockpicks!
Craftable Staves!
New craftable weapons and armor! (Balanced)
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
descriptionHtml:
I\'ve finally decided to make my mod available on Skyrim nexus :)
See : http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=160750&searchtext= for Steam workshop upload.

This mod is designed to try and add more variance and usefulness to blacksmithing.

Changelog: 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version 1.0.0
-Dragon armor can be accessed after Draedic smithing and visa-versa.

-Added crafting recipies for the main arrow types (Iron, Steel, Dwarven, Orcish, Elven, Glass, Ebony, Daedric) (Requires appropriate blacksmithing perks)
-Added four new arrow types: (Require arcane blacksmith) 
Frozen Arrow - Explodes and slows all targets within a small radius for a few seconds
Flaming Arrow - Explodes and deals fire damage to all targets within a small radius for a few seconds
Shocking Arrow - Explodes and deals magicka damage to all targets within a small radius. Targets within the radius are also knocked over.
True Flight Arrow - An ethereal arrow that travels very quickly and is barely effected by gravity

-Added Pickaxe and Woodcutters axe recipies
-Added \"Hurricane\" bow recipe, a low level bow with low damage but a high rate of fire
-Added \"Bone Crown\" recipe, this requires the dragon armor smithing perk. It has slightly higher stats than the dragonplate helm
-Added \"Black Blade\" recipe, a two hand ebony katana with slightly better stats than the ebony greatsword
-Added \"Hell Bringer\" recipe, a two handed draedic/ebony katana with slightly better stats than the draedic greatsword (Also has a fire enchantment)

-Added Silver sword/greatsword recipies (Requires Arcane Blacksmith)

-Added Executioner\'s armor recipe(s) (No requirements)
-Added Executioner\'s Axe recipe (No requirements)
-Added Blades Armor recipe(s) (Requires Steel smithing)
-Added Blades Sword recipe (Requires steel smithing)
-Added Scimitar recipe (Requires steel smithing)

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version 1.0.1
-Tweaked blades armor/sword recipe (Now requires Corundum Ingots as well)
-Added Lockpick recipe (1 Iron bar produces 5 lockpicks)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version 1.1.0
-Added craftable Staves (Most models) (No requirements)
NOTE: At the moment the staves are purely aesthetic. I hope to soon release a mod that allows the enchanting and disenchanting of staves.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Vesion 1.1.1
-Fixed \'Hurricane\' Bow. It now has the correct speed stat
-Added an FX shader to the \'Hurricane\' Bow.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Vesion 1.1.2
-All craftable staves now do a base damage of 8
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Vesion 1.1.3
-Added craftable circlets (Jewelry)
-Added Jade gem
-Added Copper Ingot 
(Jade gems and copper ingots are only currently used for crafting circlets - They can be obtained from vendors*)
* Not a 100% chance
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version 1.1.4
-Changed Copper bar texture
-Changed The black blade / Hellbringer textures (very slightly)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version 1.1.4 - HOTFIX
-Fixed missing textures
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version 1.1.5
-Slightly altered the textures for frozen, flaming and shocking arrows (It\\\\\\\'s much more obvious which one you\'re using now)
-Added a VERY broken spear (Only accessible via the console)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version 1.2.0
-Added craftable Forsworn weapons, armor and arrows
-Added craftable \"Daedric mask\" 
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version 1.2.1
-Added \"The Black Dagger\"
-Changed the Iron spear mesh/texture (Still only accessible via the console - There are no custom animations for it yet)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version 1.2.2
-Changed the Black Dagger texture slightly
-Added Craftable Falmer weapons, armor and arrows
-Added craftable Fur armor (all four chest variants included)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version 1.2.3
-Added Craftable Torches
-Added Craftable Light Bone helm. (Weighs less + reduced armor)
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version 1.2.4
-Added Craftable Imperial Bow/Sword
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version 1.2.4 - HOTFIX
-Fixed Craftable Torch
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version 1.2.5
-Executioner\'s Axe can now be upgraded
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Version 1.2.6
-Attempted to fix the damage bug with the Black Blade / Hellbringer. Please let me know if their damage still isn\'t scaling with perks.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I have tried to keep everything as balanced as possible. If you have any requests, feel free to ask.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
HOW TO INSTALL:
Extract the contents of the .zip folder to your Skyrim data folder* (with exception of the README)

*Skyrim data folder : \"C:\\Program Files (x86)\\Steam\\SteamApps\\common\\skyrim\\Data\"

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


-Those having problems with the daedric mask, please let me know your characters:
Race, Gender and equipped armor
